alert.note: Alert for Humboldt County; Northeastern Nye County; Northern Elko County; Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County; Northwestern Nye County; Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range; South Central Elko County; Southeastern Elko County; Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County; Southwest Elko County; White Pine County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 29 at 5:24PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...Gusty winds, showers and colder temperatures continue this Memorial Day weekend... For the rest of this Sunday afternoon and evening expect scattered showers and isolated thunderstorms across much of northeastern and east-central Nevada. Northwesterly winds will be gusty across most of the region into this evening, with gusts of 20 to 35 mph in most areas, however stronger gusts of 45 to 55 mph are possible. For tonight, temperatures will range from mid 20s to low 30s for most valley locations, with winds and showers diminishing. Less active weather on Monday. Isolated showers and thunderstorms will be mainly confined to Elko and White Pine Counties. Winds will be lighter too, with most gusts in the 15 to 25 mph range. Below normal temperatures continue Monday and Monday night. Visit www.weather.gov/elko for the latest weather information.
